channel.title: Blog with Radical Market: The Free Software Movement And The New Form Of Labor
channel.description: Blog with Radical Market: The Free Software Movement And The New Form Of Labor

item.title: Blog with Radical Market: The Free Software Movement And The New Form Of Labor[0-50]
item.description:
Blog with Radical Market: The Free Software Movement And The New Form Of Labor About the book Radical Market:
“(A)n arresting if eccentric manifesto for rebooting liberalism…the policies they advocate…may help jolt liberals out of their hand-wringing, and shape a new line of market-oriented thinking, as Milton Friedman’s ‘Capitalism and Freedom’ did…refreshing and welcome in its willingness to question received wisdom…(L)iberals must find some antidote to populism and protectionism. A little outlandishness may be necessary.”
―Henry Curr, The Economist
About the RadicalxChange event:
RadicalxChange aims to build a clear, coherent, and sustainable alternative to capitalism that embraces markets, egalitarianism, community, and decentralization.
Article: https://radicalxchange.org/blog/posts/2019-05-31-tz00lw/
item.content:encoded:
泰德邦德:
Blog with Radical Market: The Free Software Movement And The New Form Of Labor
About the book Radical Market:
“(A)n arresting if eccentric manifesto for rebooting liberalism…the policies they advocate…may help jolt liberals out of their hand-wringing, and shape a new line of market-oriented thinking, as Milton Friedman’s ‘Capitalism and Freedom’ did…refreshing and welcome in its willingness to question received wisdom…(L)iberals must find some antidote to populism and protectionism. A little outlandishness may be necessary.”
―Henry Curr, The Economist
About the RadicalxChange event:
RadicalxChange aims to build a clear, coherent, and sustainable alternative to capitalism that embraces markets, egalitarianism, community, and decentralization.
Article: https://radicalxchange.org/blog/posts/2019-05-31-tz00lw/

qaweqa:
是什么让你着急到发这样一个帖子

八代一:
纯外文的帖子不是那啥吗

112zero:
？所以你想在哪里建立？打倒资本主义还轮得到你们来说
— from Google Pixel 2, Android 9 of S1 Next Goose v2.1.0-play

江南映月:
发纯外文的帖子不是要被口么？
